Question: Which of the following statements are true regarding the palace in Phaltan?
Options:
A. a) The palace in Phaltan was used as a filming location for a movie.
B. b) Phaltan is a city in Maharashtra.
C. c) The palace is known for its historical significance.
D. d) The palace is located in the city of Phaltan.
Answer: a) The palace in Phaltan was used as a filming location for a movie. & b) Phaltan is a city in Maharashtra. & d) The palace is located in the city of Phaltan.
